summary: this mod adds more bonuses for each race, wich results in them being more specialized in their main class.
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds more bonuses for each race (exl. orcs) , wich results in them being more specialized in their main class. 
the bonuses are ( incl. already existing ones):
Breton: 25 + magicka, 33% + magicka regen
high elf: 10% less spell cost for all spells.
nord: 10% fortify smithing, 10% shorter shout cooldown
Argonian: 20% + health regeneration
Imperial: 50 more carry weight
Redguard: 50+ stamina
Khatjid: 15% better sneak
Dunmer: 20% less cost for destruction spells
Bosmer: 20% archery damage
Orsimer(orcs): 5 unarmed damage, 20% + two-handed damage


To-do list
possibly ask modders of popular extra race mods to also intergrate their race in a optional file

Other mods made by me:
Clans and faction races: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9615
author: Colers
